title: Prometheus metrics are broken 2.49.0
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `./erigon --version`
docker thorax/erigon:v2.49.0 

OS & Version: Windows/Linux/OSX
thorax/erigon:v2.49.0


Erigon Command (with flags/config):
```
--metrics
--metrics.addr {{ http_address }}
--metrics.port 6060
```

Chain/Network: 
mainnet, goerly, bor
#### Expected behaviour


#### Actual behaviour

Prometheus metrics are totally destroyed and unparseble.
GET /debug/metrics/prometheus
```
# TYPE rpc_duration_seconds{method="eth_getBlockByHash",success="success"} summary
rpc_duration_seconds{method="eth_getBlockByHash",success="success"} {quantile="0.5"} 0
rpc_duration_seconds{method="eth_getBlockByHash",success="success"} {quantile="0.9"} 0
rpc_duration_seconds{method="eth_getBlockByHash",success="success"} {quantile="0.97"} 0
rpc_duration_seconds{method="eth_getBlockByHash",success="success"} {quantile="0.99"} 0
rpc_duration_seconds{method="eth_getBlockByHash",success="success"} {quantile="1"} 0
rpc_duration_seconds{method="eth_getBlockByHash",success="success"}_time 300.000000
rpc_duration_seconds{method="eth_getBlockByHash",success="success"}_sum 0.000000
rpc_duration_seconds{method="eth_getBlockByHash",success="success"}_count 5
```
